articles.title: Japan's Yuto Horigome wins Olympics' first-ever skateboarding gold medal - ESPN
articles.description: Japan's Yuto Horigome won the first-ever skateboarding competition at the Olympic Games. Silver went to Brazilian Kelvin Hoefler, while American skater Jagger Eaton took bronze.
